name: Joy Ride
tagline: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

name: Victor Victoria
tagline: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

name: Love Don't Cost a Thing
tagline: Highschool loser (Cannon) pays a cheerleader (Milian) to pose as his girlfriend so he can be considered cool. Remake of 1987' Can't Buy Me Love, starring Patrick Dempsey.

name: Only the Lonely
tagline: A Chicago cop must balance loyalty to his overbearing mother and a relationship with a shy funeral home worker.

name: Mr 3000
tagline: Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

name: The Big Wedding
tagline: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

name: Ricochet
tagline: An attorney is terrorized by the criminal he put away years ago when he was a cop.

name: The Caine Mutiny
tagline: When a US Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

name: Shining Through
tagline: An American woman of Irish, Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

name: The Bachelor
tagline: A committment-phobic man goes in search of a bride including his fed up girlfriend, to inherit his grandfather's $100 million inheritance.

name: The Player
tagline: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

name: Biker Boyz
tagline: A son of the leader of a legendary group of an urban biker gang tries to retain his championship title.

name: The Rookie
tagline: Clint Eastwood plays a veteran cop who gets stuck with a rookie cop (Charlie Sheen) to chase down a German criminal (Raul Julia.)

name: Short Circuit 2
tagline: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

name: Mud
tagline: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: Baggage Claim
tagline: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.

name: Your Highness
tagline: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

name: He Got Game
tagline: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

name: Just Wright
tagline: A physical therapist falls for the basketball player she is helping recover from a career-threatening injury.

name: The Way Way Back
tagline: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

name: The Right Stuff
tagline: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

name: Married to the Mob
tagline: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife seeking to start her life over after her husband's murder and who is also pursued by a libidinous mafia kingpin seeking to claim her for himself.

name: The Book Thief
tagline: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being sheltered by her adoptive parents.

name: Battlefield Earth
tagline: After enslavement & near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

name: Urban Legends: Final Cut
tagline: Urban legend-style killings begin to occur on a movie set, in this non-sequel sequel to "Urban Legend".

name: The Last Mimzy
tagline: Two siblings begin to develop special talents after they find a mysterious box of toys. Soon the kids, their parents, and even their teacher are drawn into a strange new world and find a task ahead of them that is far more important than any of them could imagine!

name: Tough Guys
tagline: Two elderly gangsters are released from prison only to find they have trouble fitting in as old men who still take no guff from anyone.

name: Toys
tagline: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

name: The Darkest Hour
tagline: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

name: Quigley Down Under
tagline: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Montana by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

name: Cold Creek Manor
tagline: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin to renovate the place they discover their new home harbors secrets, conceals a horrific past, and may not be free of the former inhabitants completely.

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
tagline: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

name: Mr. Magoo
tagline: The myopic millionaire defeats jewel smugglers in his usual bumbling manner.

name: Psycho
tagline: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.

name: Mars Needs Moms
tagline: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

name: The Fog
tagline: A Northern California fishing town, built 100 years ago over an ancient leper colony, becomes shrouded by a killer fog containing zombie-like ghosts seeking revenge for their deaths.

name: Transcendence
tagline: As Dr. Will Caster works toward his goal of creating an omniscient, sentient machine, a radical anti-technology organization fights to prevent him from establishing a world where computers can transcend the abilities of the human brain.

name: Waist Deep
tagline: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.

name: The Bells of St. Mary's
tagline: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

name: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
tagline: Still haunted by his gruesome past, Tommy Jarvis - the boy who killed Jason Voorhees - wonders if somehow he is connected to brutal slayings occurring in and around the secluded halfway house where he now lives.

name: Dream House
tagline: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

name: Coneheads
tagline: Aliens with conical crania come to Earth to observe human life.

name: Conan the Barbarian
tagline: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

name: Amazing Grace
tagline: The idealist William Wilberforce maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

name: Straight Talk
tagline: A woman ditches her small town life for big city Chicago, where she becomes a sensation as a radio show host.

name: Mister Roberts
tagline: Comedy-drama about life on a not particularly important ship of the US Navy during WW2.

name: To Die For
tagline: Suzanne Stone is an aspiring TV personality who will do anything to be in the spotlight- including enlisting 3 teenagers to kill her husband.

name: Cujo
tagline: A friendly St. Bernard named "Cujo" contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

name: Christine
tagline: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

name: Bulletproof
tagline: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Years later the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

name: ATL
tagline: As four friends prepare for life after high school, different challenges bring about turning points in each of their lives. The dramas unfold and resolve at their local rollerskating rink, Cascade.

name: Cabin Fever
tagline: A group of five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

name: Stir of Echoes
tagline: After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around her.

name: The Next Three Days
tagline: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

name: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
tagline: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.

name: Antwone Fisher
tagline: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

name: Weekend Pass
tagline: Three rookie sailors who have just completed basic training are out on their first weekend pass. As they hit one bar after another, they soon forget everything the Navy ever taught them.

name: Madhouse
tagline: The luxurious villa of Mark and Jessie Bannister, a yuppie couple, is overrun by loads of uninvited guests who turn the house up side down.

name: Flight of the Phoenix
tagline: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

name: Van Wilder
tagline: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

name: The Black Cauldron
tagline: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

name: The Man with the Golden Gun
tagline: Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin and must hunt him down to stop him.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
tagline: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Flicka
tagline: Young Katy claims a wild horse as her own -- an effort to prove to her father that she is capable of one day taking over the family ranch.

name: Reality Bites
tagline: Generation X Graduates face life after college with a filmmaker looking for work and love in Houston.

name: The X Files: I Want to Believe
tagline: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

name: High School High
tagline: Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.

name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
tagline: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

name: Intersection
tagline: Vincent Eastman has to choose between his wife of 16 years, Sally, or his new love, Olivia. Frequent flashbacks explain the background to the marriage and the affair.

name: Shorts
tagline: A young boy's discovery of a colorful, wish-granting rock causes chaos in the suburban town of Black Falls when jealous kids and scheming adults alike set out to get their hands on it.

name: Super Mario Bros.
tagline: The Marios rush to save a princess from Koopa.

name: Mr. Baseball
tagline: A fading baseball player is traded to a Japanese team and has trouble fitting into the society.

name: Beautiful Girls
tagline: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

name: The Kids Are All Right
tagline: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their father into their family life.

name: The Hills Have Eyes II
tagline: A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.

name: Say Anything...
tagline: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

name: Whale Rider
tagline: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

name: Jaws: The Revenge
tagline: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

name: Fear
tagline: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

name: The Apostle
tagline: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

name: Hamlet
tagline: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, finds out that his uncle Claudius killed his father to obtain the throne, and plans revenge.

name: Il Postino: The Postman
tagline: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.
